Package com.eim.utility.statistics.utility

Class Summary
DoublesArrayLoader Utility class that loads an array of double from the filesystem.
It possesses a cache system.
HibernateUtil Hibernate utility class that initializes the Hibernate engine with all configuration information (such as database parameters, classes to persist, ...).
It also provides a set of methods that allows the manipulation of data (statistics) on the database using Hibernate.
PropertiesProvider Utility class that load properties file from the file system.
StatisticsDateComputer Utility class that provides methods handling dates computations.
StatisticsSetComputer Utility class that provides methods handling statistics set computations, would they be benchmark related or not.
StatisticsValueComputer Utility class that handles the assignments of statistics to the statistics objects but also provides a set computation methods.
StatisticsValueComputer.DrawdownDescriptor Object class that defines a drawdown descriptor
